description:
Build your layers on a foundation of soft merino wool and keep your warmth right where it should be. Kari Traa’s Rose Light long sleeve is your first defense against heat-sneaking winter. The pure merino fabric is super-fine, soft and offers complete freedom of movement. The knit rose pattern and contrasting seams? Just a nod to their hometown of Trysil, Norway.

  • Fine gauge merino wool is gentle on your skin
  • Fabric wicks moisture to keep you dry and is naturally antimicrobial for comfort and odour management
  • High waist layers well and adds extra coverage from the cold
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Regular fit wears just like you want it to
name: Kari Traa Rose Light Long Sleeve - Women's
